T02D2302:230a-1: shr'i krishna badzra p'a da do ha ko sha t'i k'a /
T02D2302:230a-3: dpal nag po rdo rje zhabs kyi do ha mdzod kyi rgya cher 'grel pa /
T02D2302:230a-4: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2302:230a-5: 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho dri med chus gang ba'i //
T02D2302:230a-6: sngags kyi lugs kyi mtsho las pad skyes pa //
T02D2302:230a-7: spyod 'chang nag po 'gro don sbrang rtsi yi //
T02D2302:230a-8: bsung gi me tog rtag tu rgyal gyur cig /
T02D2302:230b-0: rang gi @230b slob mas bskul ba'i dbang gis te
T02D2302:230b-1: // mkhas pa dpag med rdo rje yis //
T02D2302:230b-2: spyod zhabs do ha ko sha yi //
T02D2302:230b-3: tshig don rab tu dbye bar bya //
T02D2302:230b-4: 'dir log pa'i shes pa nyid kyis mchog gi don
T02D2302:230b-5: la mkhas pa'i bdag nyid yin no zhes nga rgyal
T02D2302:230b-6: bsam bzhin pas 'jig rten pa rnams nga'i de kho
T02D2302:230b-7: na nyid rig pa yin no zhes nga rgyal byed
T02D2302:230b-8: par grags pa de rnams la bltas nas /
T02D2302:230b-9: snying rje'i khur bus brlan pa'i thugs kyis de'i nga
T02D2302:230b-10: rgyal thams cad 'joms par 'dod pas ji lta ba
T02D2302:230b-11: bzhin du 'gyur ba'i sngags kyi lugs kyi de kho
T02D2302:230b-13: skye 'gro thams cad kyi thun mong gi don du
T02D2302:230b-14: 'phral skad tshig gi slob dpon spyod pa'i rdo rje
T02D2302:230b-15: nga ni mchog gi don la mkhas pa zhes /
T02D2302:230b-16: 'jig rten pa ni nga rgyal byed ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2302:230b-17: 'jig rten pa ni nga rgyal byed pa de nyid gang yin zhe na /
T02D2302:230b-18: nga ni mchog don la mkhas pa //
T02D2302:230b-20: 'di ni ji snyed yod tshad bstan pa yin gyi bye brag du bstan pa ni ma yin no //
T02D2302:230b-21: de bstan pa'i phyir bye ba'i nang na gcig tsam
T02D2302:230b-22: srid de zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te
T02D2302:230b-23: / gang de bye ba'i nang na srid na ste //
T02D2302:230b-24: rdul med pa 'dod chags la sogs pa nyon mongs pa dang 'dir bral bas rdul bral te /
T02D2302:230b-26: de la zhugs par gyur pa ni de la yid nges par zhugs pa ste /
T02D2302:230b-27: rdul med pa la zhugs pa'o //
T02D2302:230b-28: rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug de yang nga lta bu yin zhes dgongs so //
T02D2302:230b-29: log pa'i shes pa'i nga rgyal dang ldan pa rnams
T02D2302:230b-30: sun phyung nas 'jig rten pa'i bde ba'i shes rab
T02D2302:230b-31: dang ldan pas don dam par bdag gis shes so
T02D2302:230b-32: zhes mngon pa'i nga rgyal byed pa'i mkhas pa rnams
T02D2302:230b-34: lung dang rigs pa rnying pa yis kyang ni //
T02D2302:230b-35: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2302:230b-36: lung la sogs pa shes pa'i mkhas pa rnams nga
T02D2302:230b-37: rgyal byed pa ni don dam pa'i bden pa shes
T02D2302:230b-38: par mngon pa'i nga rgyal byed pa'o//
T02D2302:230b-39: de lta bur gyur pa gang la ji ltar ji byed snyam pa la /
T02D2302:230b-40: dpal 'bras smin pa la ni bung ba bzhin //
T02D2302:230b-41: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2302:230b-42: bde rnams 'khor zhing rgyu ba bzhin //
T02D2302:230b-45: gzhan ni ji lta ba bzhin du phyi rol nas 'khor zhing rgyu ba'o //
T02D2302:231a-0: de bzhin du phyi rol gyi sngags @231a * //
T02D2302:231a-1: dang phyag rgya la sogs pas 'brel te /
T02D2302:231a-2: de'i lta ba la mngon par zhen pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2302:231a-3: zab mo de kho na nyid kyi don ni /
T02D2302:231a-4: bdud rtsi mi rigs zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2302:231a-5: de ltar yang lha mo bzhis zhus pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las /
T02D2302:231a-6: thub pa chen po'i chos phung ni //
T02D2302:231a-7: brgyad khri dang ni bzhi stong dag / gang gis de nyid mi shes na //
T02D2302:231a-8: de dag thams cad 'bras bu med //
T02D2302:231a-10: gal te de lta yin na spros pa'i rnam pa
T02D2302:231a-11: ji ltar dngos su byed ces brjod par bya ste
T02D2302:231a-12: / spros pa'i rnam pa phung po dang khams dang
T02D2302:231a-13: skye mched la sogs pa yang spros pa med pa
T02D2302:231a-14: lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes de nyid las skyes
T02D2302:231a-15: / pa'o // de nyid las spros pa'i rnam pa byung ba ste /
T02D2302:231a-16: de bstan par bya ba'i ched du de ltar yang /
T02D2302:231a-17: spros pas spros pa med par bya //
T02D2302:231a-19: de'i phyir ae wam las yi ge lhan cig skyes pa'i sku las /
T02D2302:231a-20: ji ltar 'gro ba 'byung bar bstan pa'i phyir //
T02D2302:231a-21: byang chub sems dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2302:231a-22: byang chub sems dang rdul gyis ni //
T02D2302:231a-23: mi bskyod lus kyis 'khyud gyur pa //
T02D2302:231a-31: sems dang sems las byung ba dang ma rig pa'o //
T02D2302:231a-32: bud med dang skyes pa dang ma ning ngo //
T02D2302:231a-33: nyin mo dang nub mo dang mtshams so //
T02D2302:231a-37: lus dang ngag dang yid do //
T02D2302:231a-41: spyan drangs pa dang gshegs su gsol ba dang zhugs pa'o //
T02D2302:231a-42: aom a'a:h'um gi yi ge rnams dang /
T02D2302:231a-43: 'og dang steng dang thad ka'i sgo'o //
T02D2302:231a-50: zla ba dang nyi ma dang sgra gcan no //
T02D2302:231a-51: skyes pa dang gnas pa dang 'jig pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa byang chub kyi sems dang /
T02D2302:231a-52: rdul dang mi bskyod pa'i sgras brjod pa'o //
T02D2302:231a-53: 'di ltar gang du mthong zhes bya ba la /
T02D2302:231a-54: padma'i sa bon gyi ni rang bzhin gyi //
T02D2302:231a-55: dag pa lhan cig skyes pa lus la mthong //
T02D2302:231a-56: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2302:231a-58: de'i sa bon rang bzhin gyis so //
T02D2302:231b-0: dag pa ni dri ma med @231b cing rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir /
T02D2302:231b-1: de nyid lhan cig skyes pa'i sku'o //
T02D2302:231b-2: 'di gang du mthong zhing rtogs snyam pa la /
T02D2302:231b-3: rang lus la mthong ba ste /
T02D2302:231b-4: 'di'i don ni lus dang ngag dang yid las skyes pa'i bcom ldan 'das so //
T02D2302:231b-5: thams cad stong pa'i khams la zhugs pa 'gro ba ae wam gyi yi ge'i ngo bo nyid do //
T02D2302:231b-6: de ltar dang po'i sangs rgyas kyi rgyud las /
T02D2302:231b-7: lus kyi thig le zla ba byang chub sems //
T02D2302:231b-8: ngag dang tsheg drag rdul dang nyi ma'o //
T02D2302:231b-9: r'a hu dus me dag gi sems 'di ni //
T02D2302:231b-10: ae dang wam ni 'gro kun sa bon gcig / ces gsungs te /
T02D2302:231b-11: 'di nyid kyi phyir yang mkha' 'gro ma'i 'khor lo skye ba dang ;
T02D2302:231b-12: gnas pa dang thim pa dang /
T02D2302:231b-13: rab tu zhi ba zhes gsungs so //
T02D2302:231b-14: de'i phyir ae dang wam gi yi gye dag las rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i 'gro ba 'byung ngo //
T02D2302:231b-15: ji ltar 'jim bag gi gong bu las 'jim bag
T02D2302:231b-16: gcig las byas pa'i bum pa'i mtshan nyid kyi 'bras
T02D2302:231b-18: de la ji ltar gcig las gzugs dang dbyibs dang
T02D2302:231b-19: phyogs sna tshogs nas gnas pa rgyun ma chad pa
T02D2302:231b-20: mtha' med pa ji ltar 'byung zhe na /
T02D2302:231b-21: de la brjod par bya ste /
T02D2302:231b-22: ji ltar mkhan po dag las rig / mar me las ni mar me bzhin //
T02D2302:231b-23: ji ltar rgya las rgya nyid dang //
T02D2302:231b-24: me long las ni gdong dang gdong //
T02D2302:231b-25: sgra las sgra brnyan 'byung ba bzhin //
T02D2302:231b-26: me shel las ni me 'byung bzhin //
T02D2302:231b-27: nyi gzugs nyi ma phyed na me //
T02D2302:231b-28: lce 'dzag skyur zos med na med //
T02D2302:231b-29: rang las ma yin gzhan las min //
T02D2302:231b-30: gnyis ka las min rgyu med min //
T02D2302:231b-31: dngos po gang dang gang las kyang //
T02D2302:231b-32: skye ba nam yang yod ma yin //
T02D2302:231b-33: pha dang ma yi khu dang khrag / de bzhin srog dang thur sel dang //
T02D2302:231b-34: sems kyi rdo rje yang dag ldan //
T02D2302:231b-35: lus kyi skyed par byed pa'i rgyu //
T02D2302:231b-36: 'od dpag med dang rin chen srog / thur sel go rims ji lta bar //
T02D2302:231b-37: lus ngag yid dang chags pa ni //
T02D2302:231b-38: thugs kyi rdo rje zhal rnams so //
T02D2302:231b-39: khu ba las ni zla ba 'byung //
T02D2302:231b-40: khrag las nyi ma srid pa ste //
T02D2302:231b-41: srog las r'a hur skye ba'o //
T02D2302:231b-42: thur sel rtsol las dus me ste //
T02D2302:231b-43: khu ba las ni rtsa rnams skye //
T02D2302:231b-44: khu ba las ni rus pa 'byung //
T02D2302:231b-46: sha las pags pa skye ba ste //
T02D2302:231b-47: rus pa las ni rkang 'byung ngo //
T02D2302:231b-48: zla ba las ni chu skye zhing //
T02D2302:232a-2: r'a hu las ni srog skye ste //
T02D2302:232a-3: dus me las ni thur sel 'byung //
T02D2302:232a-5: lus can kun gyi lce chung dang //
T02D2302:232a-6: lce ni khu ba dag gis kyang //
T02D2302:232a-7: g-yas dang g-yon pa dag gis ni //
T02D2302:232a-8: mig gnyis dag ni rdul las skyes //
T02D2302:232a-9: de bzhin sna yi bug pa gnyis //
T02D2302:232a-10: khrag dag las ni nges par skye //
T02D2302:232a-11: de bzhin rna ba'i bug pa gnyis //
T02D2302:232a-12: stong pa dag ni nyid las skyes //
T02D2302:232a-13: de bzhin 'og gi rgyun sgo gsum //
T02D2302:232a-14: thur sel nyid las yang dag skye //
T02D2302:232a-15: de bzhin nu ma'i bug pa gnyis //
T02D2302:232a-16: r'a hu las ni yang dag skye //
T02D2302:232a-17: de bzhin 'bras bu gnyis po ni //
T02D2302:232a-18: thur sel dag las rab tu skye //
T02D2302:232a-19: de ltar 'dir rim pas lus po'i padma skye bar
T02D2302:232a-20: 'gyur bas de'i phyir skye ba'i tshogs pa kun rdzob
T02D2302:232a-21: dang don dam pa'i rim par ston pa'i phyir /
T02D2302:232a-22: nam mkha'i chu dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2302:232a-23: nam mkha' ni mi bskyod pa ste /
T02D2302:232a-24: de nyid chu ru mtshon pa ste //
T02D2302:232a-25: de ltar 'di'i shin tu dag pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2302:232a-27: nam mkha' bdud rtsi thigs pa dang //
T02D2302:232a-29: 'od dpag med kyi 'dam zhes pa ni /
T02D2302:232a-30: 'od dpag med pa ni byang chub sems te /
T02D2302:232a-31: rdul gyis brgyan pa zhes go bar bya'o //
T02D2302:232a-33: 'dam gyi rtsa ba spang pa ni //
T02D2302:232a-34: de nyid bar pa mtshon pa'o //
T02D2302:232a-35: 'di yi don ni gzhan na yang /
T02D2302:232a-36: sa bon dang chu dang 'dam bag tshogs pa na
T02D2302:232a-37: myu gu dang sdong bu la sogs pa skye ba
T02D2302:232a-38: bzhin du yang / chos kyi dbyings sa bon dang nam mkha'i chu dang /
T02D2302:232a-39: byang chub kyi sems kyi rgyu las 'byung bar bcom
T02D2302:232a-40: ldan 'das kyi gzugs gzhom du med pa de nyid
T02D2302:232a-41: ni / padma me tog gi ngo bo nyid sdong bu dang /
T02D2302:232a-42: yal ga dang lo ma'i rim pas rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
T02D2302:232a-43: de nyid sdig spangs rtsa ba dang ni sdong bur bcas //
T02D2302:232a-44: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2302:232a-45: sdig pa'i nyes pa ste spangs pa ni bcom pa ste /
T02D2302:232a-46: 'od gsal ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D2302:232a-47: 'dis bcom pas na sdig spangs zhes bya ste /
T02D2302:232a-48: dbyangs yig dang po'i rang bzhin no //
T02D2302:232a-49: de ltar yang dang po'i sangs rgyas kyi rgyud las /
T02D2302:232a-50: dang po dbyangs yig rang bzhin te //
T02D2302:232a-51: blo zhes sangs rgyas rnams kyis brtags //
T02D2302:232a-53: sdig pa spangs shing gtso bo'i rtsa ba sdong bur byas pa'o //
T02D2302:232b-0: gang gis sdig pa spangs shing gtso @232b bo'i rtsa
T02D2302:232b-1: ba dang sdong bu byas pa gang yin zhe na
T02D2302:232b-2: / ham gi yi ge skyed par gyur pa'o zhes gsungs te /
T02D2302:232b-3: gzhan gyis bstan pa las dang ba'i sa bon zhes brjod do //
T02D2302:232b-4: de nyid ni gzhom du med pa'i pha rol dang ni kha'i tshul te ham zhes bya ba'o //
T02D2302:232b-5: yan lag med pa'i rdo rje'i yi ge'o //
T02D2302:232b-7: shin tu ring ba bsdus pa'i ngo bo nyid bde
T02D2302:232b-8: ba thams cad gcig tu bsdus pa'i ngo bo nyid
T02D2302:232b-9: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs pa la gnas
T02D2302:232b-10: zhes bya'o // de ltar yang dpal kha sbyor thig le las /
T02D2302:232b-11: dbyangs dang gsal byed yi ge las //
T02D2302:232b-12: byang chub sems ni sum cu gnyis //
T02D2302:232b-14: rgyud dang dkyil 'khor zhes su brjod //
T02D2302:232b-15: 'gro ba'i klad rgyas dbus su ni //
T02D2302:232b-16: gang zhig gnas par brjod pa ste //
T02D2302:232b-17: de yi dbus su ham yi ge / thig le'i rang bzhin gzhom du med //
T02D2302:232b-18: de ni sems can thams cad dang //
T02D2302:232b-19: brtan dang g-yo ba bskyed pa'i rgyu //
T02D2302:232b-20: gsal dang mi gsal gzugs kyis ni //
T02D2302:232b-21: de yi sa bon ngo bor gnas //
T02D2302:232b-22: lus can ma lus kun gyi gzugs //
T02D2302:232b-23: de las dang po skye bar 'gyur //
T02D2302:232b-24: bdud rtsi 'dzag pa'i tshul gyis ni //
T02D2302:232b-25: nyin dang mtshan mo rnam par gnas //
T02D2302:232b-27: me ni 'bar bar gnas pa yin //
T02D2302:232b-28: de ni dkyil 'khor yongs rdzogs par //
T02D2302:232b-30: dngos rnams snying po mchog yin phyir //
T02D2302:232b-31: de nyid dkyil 'khor zhes su brjod //
T02D2302:232b-32: de nyid len cing 'dzin pa yis //
T02D2302:232b-34: rnam par skyes par 'gyur ba'i tshig ni /
T02D2302:232b-35: 'dir rnam pa ni tha mal pa'i tshig gi rgyan no //
T02D2302:232b-36: skyes pa ni ji skad du smos pa'i ham gi yi ge las byung ba'o //
T02D2302:232b-37: gal te sdig pa gtso bo'i bor ba dang /
T02D2302:232b-38: sdong bur byas pa de ltar ni //
T02D2302:232b-40: yal ga dang lo ma'i rnam pa gang yin zhe na /
T02D2302:232b-41: ro ma brkyang ma gnyis kyis ni //
T02D2302:232b-42: g-yas dang g-yon phyogs gnyis kyi sdong bur gnas //
T02D2302:232b-44: bde ba chen po tshang na gnas //
T02D2302:232b-46: de la brkyang ma'i sgra ni dbyangs yig dang shes rab zla ba zhes brjod de /
T02D2302:232b-47: de yang g-yon phyogs kyi sna bug na rang bzhin
T02D2302:233a-0: des srog gi rlung rgyu zhing brkyang mar @233a *
T02D2302:233a-2: ro ma'i sgra ni gsal byed kyi gzugs thabs dang nyi ma zhes brjod do //
T02D2302:233a-3: de yang g-yas phyogs sna bug gi rang bzhin te /
T02D2302:233a-4: rang bzhin ni srog gi rlung rgyu zhing ro mar gnas so //
T02D2302:233a-5: de las byung ba tshogs pa'i rim pas rnam par shes pa dang /
T02D2302:233a-10: dkyil 'khor rnams ni srid pa skye ba'i rim pas brkyang ma'o //
T02D2302:233a-11: sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha'i
T02D2302:233a-12: rang bzhin ni srid pa 'jig pa'i rim pas ro
T02D2302:233a-13: ma'o // de ltar 'pho ba bcu gnyis kyi rim
T02D2302:233a-14: pas mi mnyam pa dang mnyam par rgyu ba'i gzung
T02D2302:233a-16: padma 'dab ma bzhi zhes pa ni stong pa bzhi'i rang bzhin 'dab ma bzhi'o //
T02D2302:233a-17: rtsa ba bzhi zhes pa ni khams bzhi'i rang bzhin rtsa bzhi gyen la gnas pa'o //
T02D2302:233a-19: bde ba chen po dag ni tshang na gnas //
T02D2302:233a-21: dga' ba bzhi'i rang bzhin stong pa'i bdag nyid bde
T02D2302:233a-22: ba chen po'i tshang ste gnas pa ni 'dir bde
T02D2302:233a-23: ba chen po'i gnas te spyi bo'i padma'o //
T02D2302:233a-24: de la thams cad stong pa bzhi ste mkha' 'gro
T02D2302:233a-25: dang mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi dra ba'i tshogs te
T02D2302:233a-26: / dz'a landha ra zhes bya ba'i ming du brjod la /
T02D2302:233a-27: ri rab kyi rtse la zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2302:233a-28: ae wam sa bon khyer nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02D2302:233a-29: ae wam ni gong du bstan pa'i mtshan nyid dang
T02D2302:233a-30: ldan pa'i ae wam gyi yi ge'i sa bon blangs
T02D2302:233a-31: nas / de'i sa bon snying por gyur nas /
T02D2302:233a-32: me tog ni gzhom du med pa'i padma rgyas pas zhes bya'o //
T02D2302:233a-34: sa bon gyi sdong bu la sogs pa skyas pa
T02D2302:233a-35: de stong pa me tog kyang sa bon gyi snying
T02D2302:233a-36: po rgyu can nyid du 'gyur ro //
T02D2302:233a-37: 'dir yang ae wam gyi yi ge las skyes pa'i lus kyi padma yang /
T02D2302:233a-38: ae wam gyi snying po can gyi me tog go //
T02D2302:233a-39: bung ba'i gzugs kyis zhes bya ba la bung ba ni thugs kyi rdo rje'o //
T02D2302:233a-40: de'i gzugs ni rang bzhin no //
T02D2302:233a-41: bde chen dpa' bo zhes pa ni /
T02D2302:233a-42: de dang de'i thabs dang shes rab gnyis kyis gnyis sprod pa'i sbyor ba ste /
T02D2302:233a-43: de la rgyun mi 'chad par 'dod chags chen po'i
T02D2302:233a-44: ngo bo nyid kyis rnam par gnas par gsal ba'i
T02D2302:233a-45: phyir / de nyid bcom ldan gzhom du med pa la dpa' bo zhes bya'o //
T02D2302:233a-46: sbrang rtsi ni me tog gi bcud de /
T02D2302:233b-0: @233b bde ba chen po'i dpa' bo yin pas byang
T02D2302:233b-1: chub kyi sems ni 'byung ba chen po nyams su
T02D2302:233b-2: myong ngo zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2302:233b-3: de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das ae wam gyi yi ge'i rang bzhin /
T02D2302:233b-4: zag pa dang bcas pa'i 'byung ba lnga'i rang bzhin du ji ltar 'gyur snyam pa la /
T02D2302:233b-5: 'byung ba chen po lnga'i sa bon no //
T02D2302:233b-6: blangs nas tshogs pa dag las skye //
T02D2302:233b-8: 'byung ba ni sa la sogs pa chen po lnga dang ste /
T02D2302:233b-9: sa bon ni ae wam gyi yi ge'o //
T02D2302:233b-10: blangs nas tshogs pa ni rdo rje padmar sbyor ba dag las skyes pa'i 'byung ba'o //
T02D2302:233b-11: de gsal bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2302:233b-12: sra bar 'gyur ba dag ni sa yin zhes gsungs te /
T02D2302:233b-13: sa'i khams ni sra pa nyid yin la sra ba ni sa'i khams so //
T02D2302:233b-14: zhu bar gyur pas na chu'o //
T02D2302:233b-17: bde ba yin pas na nam mkha'i khams so //
T02D2302:233b-18: lnga ni yongs su rdzogs pas zhes bya bas ni /
T02D2302:233b-19: de ltar gyur pa'i 'byung ba lnga po 'dis yongs su rdzogs pa ste /
T02D2302:233b-20: bsdus pa ni byang chub kyi sems so //
T02D2302:233b-21: de ltar yang dpal dgyes pa'i rdo rje las 'byung
T02D2302:233b-22: ba las gyur pa'i gang zag dang bcas pa'i phung
T02D2302:233b-24: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02D2302:233b-25: rdo rje padma sbyor ba las //
T02D2302:233b-26: reg las sra ba sa ni skyes //
T02D2302:233b-27: gsher ba las ni chu 'byung ngo //
T02D2302:233b-28: gtsubs pa las ni me 'byung ste //
T02D2302:233b-29: bskyod pa las ni rlung du grags //
T02D2302:233b-30: bde ba nam mkha'i khams yin te //
T02D2302:233b-31: rnam pa lnga yis yongs su bskor //
T02D2302:233b-32: dbyangs yig rnams ni bskyed pa'i rgyu //
T02D2302:233b-34: de ni zhes pa de nyid de //
T02D2302:233b-36: sa sogs de nyid bzhi dang ni //
T02D2302:233b-37: stong pa nyid ni bzhi dang yang //
T02D2302:233b-38: skye dang 'jig pa'i rgyu ru ni //
T02D2302:233b-39: de don brgyad ni shes par bya //
T02D2302:233b-40: 'od gsal las ni stong chen te //
T02D2302:233b-42: de las kyang ni shes pa 'byung //
T02D2302:233b-45: chu las yang ni sa 'byung ngo //
T02D2302:233b-46: de yi rim pas sems can skye //
T02D2302:233b-47: sa ni chu la zhugs gyur zhing //
T02D2302:233b-48: chu ni me la zhugs par gyur //
T02D2302:233b-49: me ni phra ba'i don khams zhugs //
T02D2302:233b-50: rlung ni sems la zhugs gyur nas //
T02D2302:234a-2: sems byung ma rig par zhugs nas //
T02D2302:234a-3: de yang 'od gsal bar gyur te //
T02D2302:234a-5: de nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir //
T02D2302:234a-6: rmongs gyur 'di ni stong pa nyid //
T02D2302:234a-8: de lta bur gyur pa'i theg pa las phyi rol
T02D2302:234a-9: du gyur pa'i phyir rmongs pa zhes bod pa ste
T02D2302:234a-10: // kye ma rmongs pa'i sngags kyi tshul gyis 'di nyid shes pa'o //
T02D2302:234a-13: 'di bor nas stong pa de kho na nyid gzhan med ces bya ba'i don to //
T02D2302:234a-15: srid pa zhi ba gcig pa'i bde ba chen po rdo rje bcom ldan 'das de nyid /
T02D2302:234a-16: 'dir rang nyid kyi lus kyi padmar mngon par sprul
T02D2302:234a-17: nas de ni gzhom du med pa'i me tog gi
T02D2302:234a-18: bcud sems bung ba'i gzugs kyis rtag tu 'phrogs shing
T02D2302:234a-19: gnas pa ste // de ltar yang dpal dgyes pa'i rdo rje las /
T02D2302:234a-20: rang nyid byed cing rang nyid 'phrogs //
T02D2302:234a-21: rang nyid rgyal po rang gtso bo //
T02D2302:234a-23: de ltar bsgrub par bya ba nges par byas nas /
T02D2302:234a-24: da ni sgrub byed dpyad par bya ste /
T02D2302:234a-25: de la re zhig yul ma lus pa la longs
T02D2302:234a-26: spyod pa spangs pa yang sgrub par byed pa ma
T02D2302:234a-27: yin la / yul ma lus pa la zhen pa yang sgrub byed ma yin no //
T02D2302:234a-28: nyan thos dang pha rol phyin pa'i tshul nyid la sogs pa rnam par gnas pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2302:234a-29: skyon dag pa'i yul ma lus pa la longs spyod
T02D2302:234a-30: pa nyid kyis 'dod chags chen po'i mngon par byang
T02D2302:234a-31: chub pa bstan pa'i phyir yul gyi bden pa 'di
T02D2302:234a-33: de ltar yang sa ra ha'i zhal snga nas /
T02D2302:234a-34: kha cig yul rnams dag ni spong byed cing //
T02D2302:234a-35: kha cig yul rnams dag ni 'ching bar byed //
T02D2302:234a-36: kha cig yul 'di nyid ni blangs nas su //
T02D2302:234a-37: mchog gi grol ba dag ni mngon par byed //
T02D2302:234a-39: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02D2302:234a-40: gang dang gang gis 'jig rten 'ching 'gyur la //
T02D2302:234a-41: de dang de yis 'jig rten grol bar byed //
T02D2302:234a-42: 'jig rten rmongs pa de nyid mi shes te //
T02D2302:234a-43: de nyid spangs pas dngos grub thob mi 'gyur //
T02D2302:234a-45: 'dod chags nyid kyis grol bar byed //
T02D2302:234a-46: bzlog pa'i bsgom pa de nyid kyis //
T02D2302:234a-47: sangs rgyas mu stegs kyis mi shes //
T02D2302:234b-1: gal te de ltar yin na srog chags thams cad
T02D2302:234b-2: dbul la dga' zhing chags pa de rnams 'dod chags
T02D2302:234b-3: chen po'i mngon par byang chub pa thal lo zhe
T02D2302:234b-4: na / de ltar ma yin te /
T02D2302:234b-5: yul la longs spyod pa 'ba' zhig gis rgyun ma
T02D2302:234b-6: chad pa'i bde ba chen po zhes kho bo cag
T02D2302:234b-7: mi smra ste / 'on kyang de nyid thabs dang bcas pa la zer gyis //
T02D2302:234b-8: thabs dang bral ba'i yul la snang ba gsum mi shes pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2302:234b-9: 'dod chags chen po'i bde ba dngos su mngon du byed pa med pa'o //
T02D2302:234b-10: de ltar ye shes chen po kun la snyoms par 'jug pa'i rgyud las /
T02D2302:234b-11: bha gar ling+ga zhen cing gcig tu 'jol ba de
T02D2302:234b-12: ni 'dod chags chen po'i byang chub thob par mi
T02D2302:234b-13: 'gyur ro // gang gi tshe yang bde ba 'ba'
T02D2302:234b-14: zhig blangs nas lhag par mos pa tsam gyis las
T02D2302:234b-15: dang po ba'i sa la rnam par gnas pa de'i
T02D2302:234b-17: gang la rdo rje pa da'i sbyor ba'i bde bas
T02D2302:234b-18: rang bzhin snang ba'i yang dag pa'i yon tan mtshon
T02D2302:234b-19: par byed pa de ni 'dod chags chen po'i bde
T02D2302:234b-20: ba la zhugs pa yin no //
T02D2302:234b-21: de ltar yang dpal dgyes pa'i rdo rje las /
T02D2302:234b-22: skye bo mi bzad pa yi las //
T02D2302:234b-24: thabs dang bcas na de nyid kyis //
T02D2302:234b-27: 'on te chags pa dang bcas pa ma yin pas /
T02D2302:234b-28: bde ba chen po mtshan ma mad pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2302:234b-29: de dang 'dra bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T02D2302:234b-30: da la brjod par bya ste /
T02D2302:234b-31: mtshan ma dang bcas pa'i bde ba nyid /
T02D2302:234b-32: bla ma dam pa'i gdams ngag gi mtshan ma med par 'gyur ro //
T02D2302:234b-33: de ltar sa ra ha'i zhal snga nas /
T02D2302:234b-34: gang yang mtshan mar bcas pa'i bde ba 'di //
T02D2302:234b-35: de nyid bdag nyid chen po rnams kyis mtshan ma med pa yin //
T02D2302:234b-36: rang 'byung ye shes ngo bo nyid //
T02D2302:234b-37: kun rtog bde ba chen po nyid //
T02D2302:234b-38: de'i phyir thabs dang bcas pa'i yul la longs spyod cing //
T02D2302:234b-39: 'dod chags chen po mngon par byang chub pa'i sgrub byed yin no //
T02D2302:234b-40: de nyid sa dang chu dang me'i khams ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2302:234b-44: rlung ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D2302:234b-45: nam mkha' ni nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D2302:235a-0: lnga po de nyid skye ba dang 'jig pa'i @235a * //
T02D2302:235a-1: rim pas zla ba dang nyi ma'i rim par brjod do //
T02D2302:235a-2: de ltar yang dpal dang po'i sangs rgyas kyi rgyud las /
T02D2302:235a-3: nam mkha' la sogs rtag tu g-yon nas rgyu //
T02D2302:235a-4: 'jig pa po sogs rtag tu g-yas nas rgyu //
T02D2302:235a-6: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud phyi ma las kyang /
T02D2302:235a-7: ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin dbugs //
T02D2302:235a-8: 'byung ba lnga yi ngo bo nyid de //
T02D2302:235a-9: gong bu'i gzugs kyis phyung nas ni //
T02D2302:235a-10: sna yi rtse mor rab tu brtag / rin chen kha dog sna lnga pa //
T02D2302:235a-11: srog dang rtsol ba zhes byar bshad //
T02D2302:235a-12: rang sngags snying gar bsams nas ni //
T02D2302:235a-13: sems ni thig ler rnam par dgod //
T02D2302:235a-14: 'di'i yang bye brag bshad pa ni //
T02D2302:235a-15: rdo rje phrang ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud chen po las /
T02D2302:235a-16: sna rtser yungs kar zhes bya ba //
T02D2302:235a-17: srog dang rtsol ba zhes su brtag //
T02D2302:235a-18: srog dang rtsol ba dag la 'od zer lnga //
T02D2302:235a-19: sangs rgyas lnga yi ngo bo ste //
T02D2302:235a-20: de skad du yang rdo rje snying po'i zhal snga nas //
T02D2302:235a-21: sna'i bu ga g-yon pa dang g-yas pa gnyis nas /
T02D2302:235a-22: dang po'am tha mar gang yang rung ste /
T02D2302:235a-23: gang gi tshe dbus nas rgyu ba'o //
T02D2302:235a-24: gang gi tshe nam mkha'i rlung rgyu ba de'i tshe dbus nas rgyu ba'o //
T02D2302:235a-25: gang gi tshe rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyu ba de'i tshe sna bug steng la brten nas rgyu'o //
T02D2302:235a-26: gang gi tshe me'i dkyil 'khor rgyu ba de'i tshe sna bug g-yas pa la brten nas rgyu'o //
T02D2302:235a-27: gang gi tshe sa'i dkyil 'khor rgyu ba de'i tshe 'og la reg nas rgyu'o //
T02D2302:235a-28: gang gi tshe chu'i dkyil 'khor rgyu ba de'i tshe g-yon nas rgyu'o //
T02D2302:235a-29: dkyil 'khor 'di rnams yul du blos blangs zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2302:235a-30: yul rdo rje dang padma sbyor ba ste /
T02D2302:235a-31: de las blo bde ba nyams su myong ba ye shes kyi phyag rgya de'i yul ni blo'o //
T02D2302:235a-32: de blangs nas dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo rtogs pa ste /
T02D2302:235a-33: yongs su ni rnam pa thams cad kyi ye shes
T02D2302:235a-34: drug la sogs pa la 'jug par 'gyur ba de
T02D2302:235a-35: ltar nyams su myong bar gyis zhes pa'i don to
T02D2302:235a-37: dba' rlabs med pa dag ni yongs su spyad //
T02D2302:235a-39: dba' rlabs ni spyan 'dren pa dang gshegs su gsol ba med pas dba' rlabs med pa'o //
T02D2302:235a-40: ji ltar 'gyur ba'i ae wam gyi yi ge'i ngo
T02D2302:235a-41: bo yin pa'i phyir na lhan cig skyes pa'i ngo
T02D2302:235a-42: bo rlung bum pa lta bu las shin tu 'das
T02D2302:235b-0: skyon ni dri ma ma lus @235b spangs pa ste //
T02D2302:235b-1: zhes bya ba ni ma lus pa'i sdig pa ni
T02D2302:235b-2: ma lus pa'i skyon te 'dod chags dang bral ba'i
T02D2302:235b-5: de ltar yang dang po'i sangs rgyas kyi rgyud las /
T02D2302:235b-6: chags bral lta bu'i sdig pa med //
T02D2302:235b-7: bde ba lta bu'i dge mchog med //
T02D2302:235b-8: de phyir 'gyur med bde ba la //
T02D2302:235b-9: rgyal po rtag tu sems zhugs kyis //
T02D2302:235b-11: de ltar gyur pa'i bde ba la yang mngon pa'i nga rgyal byed pa'i phyir /
T02D2302:235b-12: de la dge dang sdig pa dag kyang med //
T02D2302:235b-13: ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2302:235b-14: sdig pa ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal lo //
T02D2302:235b-15: dge ba ni byang chub kyi sems kyang phyir mi 'byung ba'i bde ba'o //
T02D2302:235b-16: de la gcig kyang med ces bya'o //
T02D2302:235b-17: de ltar dpal kha sbyor thig le'i rgyud las /
T02D2302:235b-18: chags dang chags pa bral ba gnyis //
T02D2302:235b-19: zos na srid pa nyid du 'gyur /
T02D2302:235b-21: gsal por nag po dag gis bstan //
T02D2302:235b-23: 'di gsal bar nag po spyod pa'i rdo rjes bstan te /
T02D2302:235b-24: gzhan gyis gsal por ma bstan zhes pa'i don to //
T02D2302:235b-25: 'di lta bu'i rnal 'byor las kha phyir bltas pa
T02D2302:235b-26: rnams kyis bdag nyid kyi rnal 'byor byas nas kyang
T02D2302:235b-27: mi rtog par bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2302:235b-28: phyi rol 'byung ba lta bu spyad byas nas //
T02D2302:235b-30: rang gi blos nges par spyad pas stong pa nyid ni /
T02D2302:235b-31: rnam pa'i 'khor lo stong pa nyid du rtogs pa'o //
T02D2302:235b-32: stong pa min ni rang gi lha rtog pa'i rnal 'byor ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D2302:235b-33: blo yis zhugs shing de la dmigs par 'gyur bas so //
T02D2302:235b-34: stong pa nyid dang stong min gnyis su zhes pa
T02D2302:235b-35: ni stong pa nyid dang stong pa ma yin pa
T02D2302:235b-37: kye ma rmongs ba de nyid gcig kyang ma mthong ste ma rtogs zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2302:235b-38: de lta bu yin na ji ltar na de nyid kho na yod snyom du dgongs pa la /
T02D2302:235b-39: gcig tu lhan cig skyes pa de nyid yin //
T02D2302:235b-41: lhan cig skyes pa 'ba' zhig yod na ni /
T02D2302:235b-42: nag po rdo rje kho na las shes pa'o //
T02D2302:235b-43: bstan bcos lung ni mang po bklags gyur kyang //
T02D2302:235b-45: bstan bcos ni tshad ma la sogs pa'o //
T02D2302:235b-46: lung ni bya ba dang spyod pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D2302:235b-47: de rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sgo nas klog pa dang nyan pa dang /
T02D2302:235b-48: sems pa dang goms par byas kyang cung zad kyang mi shes te /
T02D2302:236a-0: de de rnams la de'i ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir @236a * //
T02D2302:236a-2: / dba' rlabs med pa'i sngags tshul gdams ngag ni //
T02D2302:236a-3: gzhan nga lta bur shes so zhes pa'i don to //
T02D2302:236a-4: de lta bu'i gdams pa de nyid tshul de dang des rgyas par bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2302:236a-5: steng dang 'og dag tu ni mi rgyu zhing //
T02D2302:236a-6: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D2302:236a-7: steng du mi 'gro ba ni 'di'i tshul gyis srog gi rlung 'gegs pa'o //
T02D2302:236a-8: 'og tu mi 'gro ba ni thur sel gyi rlung 'gegs pa ste /
T02D2302:236a-9: lus dang ngag dang yid kyi bye brag gis zla ba dang nyi ma dang r'a hu la dang /
T02D2302:236a-11: stong pa nyid rang gi rigs kyi lam gsum dgag pa'o //
T02D2302:236a-12: 'og tu mi rgyu ba ni 'di'i tshul gyis 'og tu rgyu ba'i rlung ste /
T02D2302:236a-13: lus dang ngag dang yid gsum gyi bye brag gis
T02D2302:236a-14: dri chen dang dri chu dang byang chub kyi sems
T02D2302:236a-15: rgyu zhing sa dang chu dang me ye shes kyi
T02D2302:236a-17: de ltar steng dang 'og gi srog dang thur sel gyi lam bkag pas /
T02D2302:236a-18: sngon du bstan pa'i ye shes kyi gzugs brnyan mthong
T02D2302:236a-19: bas na de'i 'og tu rdo rje bzlas pa'i cho
T02D2302:236a-20: gas srog dang rtsol ba rtag tu 'byung bar byed
T02D2302:236a-21: do // de ltar yang dpal dus kyi 'khor lo las /
T02D2302:236a-22: gzugs brnyan mthong nas byung ba ni //
T02D2302:236a-23: srog dang rtsol ba rtag tu ni //
T02D2302:236a-24: steng dang 'og dang rtsa gsum las //
T02D2302:236a-25: lus ngag yid gsum dgag pa'i phyir //
T02D2302:236a-26: zla ba nyi ma r'a hu dang //
T02D2302:236a-27: dri chen dri chu khu rgyu ba //
T02D2302:236a-28: zla ba nyi ma mun pa dang //
T02D2302:236a-29: lus dang ngag dang yid kyi rtsa //
T02D2302:236a-30: dri chen dri chu dus rgyu ba //
T02D2302:236a-31: de dag srog rtsol rim pas so //
T02D2302:236a-32: zla ba lus kyi thabs dang ni //
T02D2302:236a-33: shes rab nyid ni nyi ma'o //
T02D2302:236a-34: shes rab kyi ni dri chen rtsa //
T02D2302:236a-35: gtso bo dag ni byang rgyu ba //
T02D2302:236a-36: chu me stong pa sa dang rlung //
T02D2302:236a-37: ye shes khams ni rang rig la //
T02D2302:236a-38: thabs kyis sems ni mun lha mo //
T02D2302:236a-39: shes rab byang chub sems rgyu ba //
T02D2302:236a-40: steng dang 'og tu rigs drug ni //
T02D2302:236a-41: lus dang ngag yid byed pas so //
T02D2302:236a-42: shes rab thabs sbyor dbye ba yis //
T02D2302:236a-43: lus can kun la rnam par gnas //
T02D2302:236a-44: de ltar gyur pas srog dang rtsol bas ji ltar gnas she na //
T02D2302:236a-45: gnyis la mi rgyu ba ni rnam par gnas //
T02D2302:236a-47: gnyis ni steng dang 'og gi srog rtsol ba ste /
T02D2302:236a-48: mi rgyu ba ni yongs su spangs pa ste /
T02D2302:236a-49: de lta bu ngo bo nyid kyi mi g-yo bar
T02D2302:236a-50: gnas pa ni dbugs 'byin par ma mchog ces bya
T02D2302:236a-51: ba / de ltar yang rig ldan pas /
T02D2302:236b-0: lhan cig @236b skyes pa he ru ka / bar ma'i dbugs ni mchog yin te //
T02D2302:236b-1: dri chen dri chu khu ba nyid //
T02D2302:236b-2: rtsa gsum dag dang ldan pa'o //
T02D2302:236b-3: dngos po gsal po de kho na nyid rjes su 'gro ba las kyang /
T02D2302:236b-4: lhan cig skyes rung rang gi gzhi la gnas //
T02D2302:236b-5: rtog pa'i dra ba dag las rab tu grol //
T02D2302:236b-6: rang yang dga' ba skyed pa brjod du med //
T02D2302:236b-7: de ni stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du //
T02D2302:236b-9: de ltar gyur pas byang chub sems bde ba chen po dgag pa bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2302:236b-10: yid ni gang du yang mi g-yo ba ni /
T02D2302:236b-11: nag pos gsungs zhes bya ba smos te /
T02D2302:236b-12: slob dpon nag po na re yid ni byang chub
T02D2302:236b-13: sems de mi g-yo ba ni gang du yang phyir
T02D2302:236b-14: mi 'byung ba ste steng dang 'og tu 'byung ba
T02D2302:236b-15: spangs pas / dus kyi rtsa khams gsum du byas pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2302:236b-16: 'di'i dgongs pa ni ri bong can gyi thig le
T02D2302:236b-17: ma lhung bar 'ba' zhig nga'i bsgrub par bya ba
T02D2302:236b-18: ma yin te / 'on kyang steng 'og gnyis su 'gro ba'i ngo bo'o //
T02D2302:236b-19: 'di lta bu'i 'byung ba med pa'i ngo bo gang du gnas she na /
T02D2302:236b-20: mi g-yo rlung gi khyim bdag mo ni khyim na gnas //
T02D2302:236b-22: mi g-yo ba'i rlung ni 'bar ba'i rlung ngo //
T02D2302:236b-23: khyim bdag mo ni de nyid ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2302:236b-24: khyim ni de'i bde ba'i nam mkha'i khams aa ham gi rang bzhin gong du gsungs pa ste /
T02D2302:236b-26: de la gnas pa ni khyim der gnas pa'o //
T02D2302:236b-27: 'di'i dgongs pa ni rlung gi 'gro ba'i chos can te /
T02D2302:236b-28: nam mkha'i khams la brten pa /
T02D2302:236b-29: 'gro ba dang 'ong ba las grol ba'i nam mkha'i khams la khyer zhing /
T02D2302:236b-30: sems kyi bzhon pa snang ba dang bcas pa ye shes gsum dang ldan pa'i thim par 'gyur ro //
T02D2302:236b-31: de'i phyir de'i bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po la zhugs pa zhes brjod do //
T02D2302:236b-33: dgongs pa bla na med pa las //
T02D2302:236b-34: snang ba snang ba mched pa dang //
T02D2302:236b-36: sems ni rnam pa gsum du brjod //
T02D2302:236b-37: rlung ni phra ba'i gzugs kyis ni //
T02D2302:236b-39: dbang po lam nas phyung nas ni //
T02D2302:236b-40: yul rnams la ni 'jug par byed //
T02D2302:236b-41: snang ba dang ni mi ldan zhing //
T02D2302:236b-42: rlung gi bzhon pa'i rgyur gyur pa //
T02D2302:236b-43: de la 'di ni rang bzhin kun //
T02D2302:236b-44: rim dang rim pa mun par 'jug /
T02D2302:237a-0: @237a * // rlung ni gang dang gang gnas pa //
T02D2302:237a-1: de dang der ni de bzhin rgyu //
T02D2302:237a-2: ji srid rlung ni mi rgyu ba //
T02D2302:237a-3: snang ba brtan par mi 'gyur ro //
T02D2302:237a-4: de nyid sems can thams cad kyi thun mong du ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T02D2302:237a-5: ri bo mchog rab dag gi phug zab mor //
T02D2302:237a-7: mchog ni phul du byung ba'i ngo bo'i ri bo ste /
T02D2302:237a-8: rab ni sgal tshigs kyi bdag nyid do //
T02D2302:237a-9: de ltar yang dpal kha sbyor thig le las /
T02D2302:237a-10: rkang pa'i mthil du rlung gnas pa //
T02D2302:237a-11: rlung ni gzhu yi dbyibs can no //
T02D2302:237a-12: mdoms kyi sum mdor gnas pa ni //
T02D2302:237a-13: de bzhin gru gsum dmar po'o //
T02D2302:237a-14: zlum po'i gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid //
T02D2302:237a-15: chu ni lto bar gnas pa'o//
T02D2302:237a-16: snying ga ru ni sa nyid kyang //
T02D2302:237a-17: kun du gru bzhir gnas pa'o //
T02D2302:237a-18: sgal tshigs dbyug pa'i ngo bo ni //
T02D2302:237a-19: de bzhin ri rgyal lhun po'o //
T02D2302:237a-20: de yi phug ni ri phug go //
T02D2302:237a-21: de lus dang ngag dang yid kyi spyod yul ma yin pas zab pa'o //
T02D2302:237a-23: 'gro ba ma lus pa ni 'ching bar 'gyur te /
T02D2302:237a-24: 'gro ba ma lus pa nyid 'ching bar 'gyur ba ni nyams pa ste /
T02D2302:237a-25: de la steng du spyi bo'i bar du dbang po
T02D2302:237a-26: gnyis kyis sbyor ba'i bde ba'i mngon pa'i nga rgyal
T02D2302:237a-27: gyi byang chub sems med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2302:237a-28: 'on te 'gro ba thams cad 'di yis bcing bar cis shes she na /
T02D2302:237a-29: dri ma med pa'i chu ni skams gyur te //
T02D2302:237a-31: dri ma med pa'i don dam pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D2302:237a-32: zhu ba ni kun rdzob kunda lta bu ste /
T02D2302:237a-33: dri ma med pa'i chu bden pa gnyis zhes bya
T02D2302:237a-34: ba byang chub kyi sems gang yin pa skams par
T02D2302:237a-36: gang gi phyir byang chub kyi sems 'gro ba'i ngo bo nyid du 'gyur ro //
T02D2302:237a-37: gang gi tshe 'og tu ltung ba de'i tshe nyams par 'gyur pa'o //
T02D2302:237a-38: de ltar yang dpal dang po'i sangs rgyas las /
T02D2302:237a-39: lus can thams cad 'chi dus su //
T02D2302:237a-40: 'og tu zla ba bdud rtsi 'dzag / rnam shes rang bzhin mtshan nyid dang //
T02D2302:237a-41: nyi khrag r'a hu steng du 'gro //
T02D2302:237a-43: dus kyi me ni rab tu zhu gyur na //
T02D2302:237a-45: dus kyi me ni byang chub kyi sems kyi phyir 'byung ba'i gnas skabs te /
T02D2302:237a-46: nag po'i phyogs kyi mtshan nyid de //
T02D2302:237a-48: de ltar yang dpal dang po'i sangs rgyas las /
T02D2302:237a-49: lhung na chags dang bral gyur te //
T02D2302:237b-0: chags bral las ni sdug bsngal @237b bskyed //
T02D2302:237b-1: sdug bsngal gyis ni khams zad de //
T02D2302:237b-4: de ltar 'dod chags bral bas byung //
T02D2302:237b-5: gzhan du sems can mi srod do //
T02D2302:237b-6: de phyir 'bad pa thams cad kyis //
T02D2302:237b-7: sems byung 'dod chags spang bar bya //
T02D2302:237b-8: rnal ma 'byung med bde ba yis //
T02D2302:237b-11: ji ltar na byang chub kyi sems 'byung bar 'gyur zhe na /
T02D2302:237b-12: sa 'dzin dag las 'di ni gzung dka' ste //
T02D2302:237b-14: gzung dka' ba ni sbyor ba'i yan lag drug gis
T02D2302:237b-15: rlung gzung zhing byang chub sems gzung dgos pa ste
T02D2302:237b-17: sa 'dzin ri rab dang 'dra ste mi g-yo ba'o //
T02D2302:237b-18: de nyid kyi phyir mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa ste zhes smos te /
T02D2302:237b-20: de la mnyam pa'i 'pho ba'i rim pas rgyu ba
T02D2302:237b-21: ni nyi ma rgyu ba g-yas pa'i sna bug go
T02D2302:237b-22: // mi mnyam pa'i 'pho ba ni rim pa ma yin pas rgyu bas na /
T02D2302:237b-23: mi mnyam pa ste zla ba rlung rgyu bas na sna bug g-yon pa'o //
T02D2302:237b-24: mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa gnyis dang ldan pa'i
T02D2302:237b-25: yid kyis sems kyi khams la lta ba ni yongs
T02D2302:237b-27: de lta bu'i shes pa'i don to //
T02D2302:237b-28: de ltar gyur pa'i yid kyis gal te mi shes
T02D2302:237b-29: na zla ba dang nyi ma mi mnyam pa dang
T02D2302:237b-31: sems can gyi rnam par shes pa'i khams ni grol
T02D2302:237b-32: bar mi nus pa de spyi gtsug par du 'gro
T02D2302:237b-33: ba mi nus pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2302:237b-35: nag po dag gis gsungs zhes smos te /
T02D2302:237b-36: nag po rdo rjes 'dod chags dang bral ba'i gnas
T02D2302:237b-37: skabs spangs pa'i bde bas ye shes kyi mig gis
T02D2302:237b-38: mtshon par byas pas na mtshon par dka' ba ste
T02D2302:237b-39: / thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang /
T02D2302:237b-40: rnam pa thams cad kyis mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D2302:237b-41: bde ba nyer bar rtogs shing nyams su myong ba de'i phyir rtogs par dka' ba'o //
T02D2302:237b-42: de la 'di lta bur gyur pa cis rtogs she na /
T02D2302:237b-43: gang gis yid kyi rin chen rtogs //
T02D2302:237b-45: gang rdo rje dang padma mnyam par sbyor ba las
T02D2302:237b-46: yid kyi nye bar dmigs shing ji lta ba bzhin
T02D2302:237b-47: du 'gyur ba'i bdag nyid dga' ba ste /
T02D2302:237b-48: bla na med pa'i bde ba 'phel bar byed pa'i phyir /
T02D2302:237b-49: rin chen ni yid kyi rin po che ste /
T02D2302:238a-2: de ltar yang dpal gsang ba 'dus pa las /
T02D2302:238a-3: bha gar ling+gi bcug nas ni //
T02D2302:238a-4: byang chub sems ni gtar mi bya //
T02D2302:238a-5: khams gsum ma lus pa rnams ni //
T02D2302:238a-6: sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan dag tu bsgom //
T02D2302:238a-7: stong nyid gzugs brnyan rgyu yin pas //
T02D2302:238a-9: de nyid kyi phyir lhan cig skyes pa spro zhes gsungs te /
T02D2302:238a-10: nyi ma re re skyes pa ni thams cad stong pa'o //
T02D2302:238a-11: 'pho ba ni nam mkha' dang 'pho zhing snang ba'o //
T02D2302:238a-12: de ltar yang mtshan yang dag par brjod pa las /
T02D2302:238a-13: nam mkha' las byung rang byung ba //
T02D2302:238a-14: shes rab ye shes me bo che //
T02D2302:238a-16: de ltar dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud phyi ma las /
T02D2302:238a-17: bsnyen pa'i dus su gtsug tor che //
T02D2302:238a-18: 'bad pas gzugs brnyan bsgom par bya //
T02D2302:238a-19: nye bar bsnyen pa'i dus su ni //
T02D2302:238a-20: gzugs brnyan bdud rtsi 'khyil pa yi //
T02D2302:238a-21: sgrub pa'i dus su lha yi gzugs //
T02D2302:238a-22: bsgom zhing mi dmigs par bya ste /
T02D2302:238a-23: sgrub pa chen po'i dus su ni //
T02D2302:238a-24: gzugs brnyan sangs rgyas gtso bo'i sems //
T02D2302:238a-26: de nyid bstan pa'i phyir rigs ldan las kyang /
T02D2302:238a-27: dgongs pa bstan pa 'di skad gzhan gyi gtsug tor
T02D2302:238a-28: gzugs brnyan ni khams gsum ma lus pa'i sangs rgyas
T02D2302:238a-29: kyi gzugs brnyan nam mkha'i chos kyi 'byung gnas la
T02D2302:238a-30: sems kyi rdo rje rab tu gzhag pa ste /
T02D2302:238a-31: bsnyen pa'i dus su so sor sdud pa bsgom par bya ste /
T02D2302:238a-32: bsam gtan gyis ni brtan par bya'o //
T02D2302:238a-33: de la bcom ldan 'das kyi dam bca' ba ni /
T02D2302:238a-34: bsam pa thams cad yongs spangs te //
T02D2302:238a-35: nyi ma gcig tu yongs su brtag / gal te yid ches ma gyur na //
T02D2302:238a-36: de'i tshe nga yis brdzun smras so //
T02D2302:238a-38: de yang yid ches pa'i du ba la sogs pa'i rtags so //
T02D2302:238a-39: de ltar yid du 'ong ba'i rin po che sangs
T02D2302:238a-40: rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan rtogs pa 'byung ba de ni
T02D2302:238a-41: / chos kyi rang bzhin dag ni de yis zhes gsungs te /
T02D2302:238a-42: rang bzhin dag ni de yis shes pa ni //
T02D2302:238a-43: de gcig pu chos kyi rang bzhin mngon par rtogs pa'o //
T02D2302:238a-44: gzhan la bzlas su zin kyang ci la go //
T02D2302:238a-46: gzhan ni dbang po'i bde ba la mngon par zhen pa'o //
T02D2302:238a-47: ci la go ni smras kyang mi go zhes pa'i don to //
T02D2302:238b-0: @238b de nyid rnam pa gzhan gyis bstan pa ni /
T02D2302:238b-1: rlung ni bzhon pa'i rgyur gyur pas snang ba gsum
T02D2302:238b-2: gyi ngo bo nyid kyi rang bzhin brgya drug cu'i
T02D2302:238b-3: ngo bo nyid dbang po'i sgo nas 'byung ba ste
T02D2302:238b-4: / yul rnams la nye bar dmigs par 'gyur ro //
T02D2302:238b-5: lam 'gro rang nyid bcings par byas pa gang //
T02D2302:238b-7: rnam par shes pa'i khams 'khor ba'i lam du 'gro ba'o //
T02D2302:238b-8: yid ni lhan cig skyes pa'i gzugs so //
T02D2302:238b-9: bcing bar bya ba ni gang gis yan lag drug gi srog brtan par byed pa ni bcings pa'o //
T02D2302:238b-10: de rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug gis byed pa de ni /
T02D2302:238b-11: khams gsum ma lus spro zhing yang der bsdu //
T02D2302:238b-16: ma lus pa ni so so'i ba spu'i bu ga'i
T02D2302:238b-17: bar du gnyid sad pa'i gnas skabs su dga' ba
T02D2302:238b-18: la sogs pa'i khyad par gyi byang chub kyi sems
T02D2302:238b-19: rnam par spros nas yang der sdud pa ste /
T02D2302:238b-20: steng du song nas bzhi pa zad cing rgyu mthun pa la sogs pa'i bye brag gis /
T02D2302:238b-21: aa wa dh'u t'ir sdud pa ste /
T02D2302:238b-22: cha dang thig le phra mo las 'das shing thams cad stong pa nyid kyi khams la zhugs te /
T02D2302:238b-23: des rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po mngon du byed ces bya ba'i don to //
T02D2302:238b-25: bde gshegs lha mo khro bo'i tshogs //
T02D2302:238b-26: srid pa ci phyir byed ces gsungs te /
T02D2302:238b-29: khro bo'i tshogs la sred pa ci'i phyir byed ces bya ste /
T02D2302:238b-30: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo dag spangs la /
T02D2302:238b-31: lhan cig skyes pa'i dus su gnas so zhes dgongs
T02D2302:238b-32: so zhes bya ba la dgongs pa 'di yin te
T02D2302:238b-33: / phung po dang skye mched la sogs pa dang /
T02D2302:238b-34: lus dang ngag dang yid dang /
T02D2302:238b-35: dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams gdams ngag gis bde ba
T02D2302:238b-36: chen po ro gcig par gyur pa de ltar na'o
T02D2302:238b-37: // de nyid dkyil 'khor chen por gyur pa las //
T02D2302:238b-38: de la gzhan du gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor med do zhes bya'o //
T02D2302:238b-39: de ltar yang gsang ba'i rgyud las /
T02D2302:238b-40: yan lag kun bsgoms las 'das shing //
T02D2302:238b-41: rtogs dang rtog byed rnam par spangs //
T02D2302:238b-42: cha dang thig le yang dag 'das //
T02D2302:238b-45: de nyid gzhan gyi sgo nas dkyil 'khor du bstan pa ni /
T02D2302:238b-46: gang gis lhan cig skyes pa brtan byas te //
T02D2302:239a-0: zhes pa lhan cig skyes pa ni lhan cig 'byung @239a * //
T02D2302:239a-2: brtan pa ni phyir 'byung ba med par bya'o //
T02D2302:239a-3: mnyam par ro gcig pa ni dga' ba bzhi po
T02D2302:239a-4: gcig pas rang gi yid kyi rgyal po ni yan
T02D2302:239a-6: de'i dus nyid du ni 'grub par 'gyur zhes gsungs so //
T02D2302:239a-7: grub pa ni phyag rgya chen po grub pa ste /
T02D2302:239a-8: rdo rje 'chang chen po thob bo //
T02D2302:239a-9: de'i dus nyid du dus ma yin pa rgyud la gcig ces bya'o //
T02D2302:239a-10: de skad du yang dpal bde mchog las /
T02D2302:239a-11: mtho ris mi yul sa 'og gi //
T02D2302:239a-12: skad cig gis ni sku gcig 'gyur //
T02D2302:239a-13: rang dang gzhan du rtog pa yis //
T02D2302:239a-14: skad cig tu ni gnod mi 'gyur //
T02D2302:239a-17: rga dang 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa dag ni med //
T02D2302:239a-19: phyag rgya chen po'i ngo bo nyid bstan pa ni /
T02D2302:239a-20: mi g-yo zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2302:239a-21: mi g-yo ba ni byang chub kyi sems phyir mi 'byung ba'o //
T02D2302:239a-22: mi rtog pa ni nyams su myong ba ro gcig pas /
T02D2302:239a-23: de dang 'di ni rnam par rtog pa spangs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2302:239a-24: 'gyur ba med pa ni 'dod chags dang 'dod chags dang bral ba dag gis ci bya zhe na /
T02D2302:239a-25: de dag las grol ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2302:239a-27: zla ba dang nyi ma bkag pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2302:239a-28: mdzes pa ni shin tu mdzes pa ste /
T02D2302:239a-29: bde ba chen po yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2302:239a-30: snying po ni 'od gsal ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D2302:239a-31: deng 'dir zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'di
T02D2302:239a-32: nyid kyi phyir mya ngan las 'das par brjod de
T02D2302:239a-33: / mya ngan las 'das pa'o zhes sgras smras pa la /
T02D2302:239a-34: yang dag pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa yin te /
T02D2302:239a-35: mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D2302:239a-36: de ji lta bu'i khyad par dang ldan zhe na /
T02D2302:239a-37: gang la sems dang sems las byung ba med //
T02D2302:239a-39: gang la ji srid sems ni rnam pa gsum ste /
T02D2302:239a-40: sems las byung ba ni sems kyi rang bzhin brgya drug cu dang /
T02D2302:239a-41: thig les kyang ci'ang mi byed de lta bu'i rnam
T02D2302:239a-42: par rtog pa cung zad kyang mi 'byung ngo zhes
T02D2302:239a-43: pa'i don to // de nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2302:239a-44: gang gis ae wam rnam par shes gyur pa //
T02D2302:239a-48: lha'i dbang pos yongs su zhus pa las /
T02D2302:239a-49: ae ni stong pa'i rang bzhin te //
T02D2302:239a-50: wam ni thugs rje chen por brjod //
T02D2302:239a-51: thig le gnyis med sbyor ba'o //
T02D2302:239b-1: ae ni ma ru brjod pa ste //
T02D2302:239b-2: wam ni pha ru shes par bya //
T02D2302:239b-3: thig le gnyis med sbyor bar 'gyur //
T02D2302:239b-4: de yi sbyor ba ngo mtshar te //
T02D2302:239b-5: ae ni padma nyid du gsungs //
T02D2302:239b-6: wam ni rdo rje'i rang bzhin no //
T02D2302:239b-7: de las thig le'i sa bon 'gyur //
T02D2302:239b-8: de las srid gsum yang dag 'byung //
T02D2302:239b-9: ae ni shes rab nyid du 'gyur //
T02D2302:239b-10: wam ni thabs su yang dag brjod //
T02D2302:239b-11: thig le de nyid mi shigs pa'o //
T02D2302:239b-12: de las yi ge ma lus byung //
T02D2302:239b-13: gang gis chos kyi phyag rgya ni //
T02D2302:239b-14: yi ge gnyis ni de nyid shes //
T02D2302:239b-15: de yis sems can thams cad la //
T02D2302:239b-17: 'gro ba gang gis yi ge gnyis//
T02D2302:239b-18: de nyid mi shes rtag tu 'don //
T02D2302:239b-19: sangs rgyas chos la phyir 'byung ste //
T02D2302:239b-20: phyug po longs spyod spangs bzhin no //
T02D2302:239b-22: 'dir de lta bu'i ae wam yi ge shes pa ni rtogs pa ste /
T02D2302:239b-23: gang gis shes pa de ni sangs rgyas rtogs pa'o //
T02D2302:239b-24: ma lus ni ae wam gyi yi ge sna tshogs lus pa med pa ste /
T02D2302:239b-25: de nyid sna tshogs gcig gi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D2302:239b-26: de ji lta bur gyur ba zhe na /
T02D2302:239b-27: de nyid chos kyi za ma tog yin te //
T02D2302:239b-29: chos rnams kyi phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams te dga' ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D2302:239b-30: de rnams kyi za ma tog ni gnas so //
T02D2302:239b-31: de nyid bod pa'i tshig go //
T02D2302:239b-32: de ni rang gi bdag po'i cha lugs so //
T02D2302:239b-34: rang gi bdag po ni thugs kyi rdo rje'o //
T02D2302:239b-36: de nyid kyis 'khyud par skyes pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2302:239b-37: yang de nyid kyis sgrub pa'i thabs mdor bstan pa ni /
T02D2302:239b-38: rlung ni 'gro ba'i sgo rnams la'ang //
T02D2302:239b-40: rlung 'gro ba'i sgo ni steng dang 'og go //
T02D2302:239b-41: dmar por ni de la brtan zhing mi phyed pa'o //
T02D2302:239b-42: lcags ni sgo drug gi rlung kha sbyor du bya ba ste /
T02D2302:239b-43: zla ba dang nyi ma'i lam bkag pas dus kyi
T02D2302:239b-44: me yongs su rdzogs par byed pa 'di'i lus kyi
T02D2302:239b-45: 'ching ba'o // gal te nang gi mun pa nag po la //
T02D2302:239b-47: gal te de la mi zad pa ni mun pa
T02D2302:239b-48: ste mi g-yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin rlung bum pa
T02D2302:239b-49: lta bu'i ngo bo nyid gzhom du med pa'i sgra
T02D2302:239b-50: / chos kyi dbang phyug yid kyi byang chub kyi
T02D2302:239b-51: sems kyis de'i tshe nyid bde ba chen po gsal
T02D2302:239b-52: bar byed pa'i phyir mar me'o //
T02D2302:239b-53: byed gyur na ni du ba la sogs pa'i rtags kyis gsal bar byed pa'o//
T02D2302:240a-2: sems kyi rdo rje 'gog pa las //
T02D2302:240a-3: mtshan ma la sogs mthong bar 'gyur //
T02D2302:240a-6: rgyal ba'i rin chen steng gi nam mkhar bzhugs //
T02D2302:240a-8: rgyal ba'i rin chen ni gzhom du med pa'i sgra de nyid do //
T02D2302:240a-9: steng gi nam mkhar bzhugs pa ni gang gi tshe
T02D2302:240a-10: rten du gyur pa drug pa ye shes kyi dkyil
T02D2302:240a-11: 'khor gyi thig le la reg pa ste /
T02D2302:240a-14: mkha' 'gro rdo rje nor bu ste /
T02D2302:240a-15: sangs rgyas rnams ni spyi bor gnas //
T02D2302:240a-18: de ltar yang dpal kha sbyor thig le las /
T02D2302:240a-19: rlung dang me yi dkyil 'khor las //
T02D2302:240a-20: rdo rje padma'i sa bon bskul //
T02D2302:240a-21: thig le sgra yis yang dag mnan //
T02D2302:240a-22: char rgyun 'bab pa dag tu dran //
T02D2302:240a-25: thig le'i sgra dang yang dag ldan //
T02D2302:240a-26: gang tshe rnam kun 'gyur ba na //
T02D2302:240a-27: de tshe 'bras bu zhes brjod par //
T02D2302:240a-28: mchog gi rnal 'byor ba yis bshad //
T02D2302:240a-31: ji srid longs spyod pas thar sgrub nag pos gsungs
T02D2302:240a-32: te nag po rdo rje srid pa la spyod pa
T02D2302:240a-33: ste / shes rab ni bde ba nyams su myong
T02D2302:240a-34: zhing 'dod chags bral ba thams cad las log pa'i
T02D2302:240a-35: ste / phyir / thar pa ni phyag rgya chen
T02D2302:240a-36: po'i go 'phang thob pa ste mngon du byed pa'o
T02D2302:240a-37: ste / phyir / // de ltar dpal dang po'i sangs rgyas las /
T02D2302:240a-38: srog ni dbus su bcug ste zla ba nyi ma 'gro ba g-yas dang g-yon bcing ba //
T02D2302:240a-39: byang sems phyag rgya 'grogs pas mchog tu dga' bar 'grogs shing rdo rje bslang bar bya //
T02D2302:240a-40: chu skyes rdo rje sgra yi rang lag padma'i rol pas bde ba phyir gsor ba'am //
T02D2302:240a-41: sa bon 'chor ba bde bcas 'jig pa song byed de ni dpal ldan bla ma'i zhal //
T02D2302:240a-43: sems kyi bcing ba nyid kyis thams cad 'grub par
T02D2302:240a-44: bsams nas sems brtan pa nyid gsal bar ston te
T02D2302:240a-45: / brtan pa'i yid kyis sbyor bas na //
T02D2302:240a-47: rdo rje padma sbyor ba'i sgo nas byang chub sems brtan pa'i sbyor ba byed pa'o //
T02D2302:240a-49: chos kyi yi ge'i nang du ni //
T02D2302:240a-51: chos kyi yi ge ni gzhom du med pa ste /
T02D2302:240b-0: @240b bdag med pa'i sa bon te /
T02D2302:240b-1: de'i nang du ni de la zhes pa'i don to //
T02D2302:240b-3: skad cig de las rlung ni 'gags 'gyur te //
T02D2302:240b-5: rlung ni srog gi rlung ste skad cig de la 'gag pa'o //
T02D2302:240b-7: yul rnams la yang chags pa med par 'gro //
T02D2302:240b-9: yul rnams ni gzugs la sogs pa'i yul rnams so //
T02D2302:240b-10: nye bar longs spyod pa ni mngon par zhen pa
T02D2302:240b-11: med par 'khor ba'i 'ching ba las grol zhes bya
T02D2302:240b-12: ba'i don to // 'on te chos kyi yi ge gang du shes par bya zhe na /
T02D2302:240b-13: gang la mchog dang dga' bral dag thob na //
T02D2302:240b-15: mchog dang dga' bral ni zla ba dang nyi ma'o //
T02D2302:240b-16: de gnyis kyi dbus su mthong ba ni de la chos kyi yi ge ste /
T02D2302:240b-17: sngon bstan pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa dbus su mtshon par bya'o //
T02D2302:240b-18: gang la 'di lta bu yi gdams ngag gsal grub na //
T02D2302:240b-20: 'di lta bu'i gsang sngags ni tshul gyis gdams ngag gis gsal bar grub ste /
T02D2302:240b-21: yongs su rdzogs pa grub pa de'i tshe khyim bdag mo rlung mi g-yo bar bcings zhes gsungs te /
T02D2302:240b-22: khyim bdag mo rlung gi sngon du bstan pa'i mtshan
T02D2302:240b-23: nyid dang ldan pa'i mi g-yo zhes bya ba'i don
T02D2302:240b-24: to // gal te 'di de la rtsol rlung bcings
T02D2302:240b-25: pas chos kyi yi ge bde ba chen po'i ngo
T02D2302:240b-26: bo rdo rje lta bu'i ngo bo nyid du gyur
T02D2302:240b-27: ba gang la gnas par 'gyur zhe na /
T02D2302:240b-28: ri bo mchog gi rtse thang spangs pa la //
T02D2302:240b-30: ri bo mchog ni rin po che'i ri bo se //
T02D2302:240b-31: de nyid sngon du bstan pa'i ri bo'o //
T02D2302:240b-33: ma lus pa'i rgyu ba dang /
T02D2302:240b-34: mi rgyu ba'i bde ba chen po nyid gnas yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2302:240b-35: thang spangs pa ni yan lag mchog gi thang ste spyi gtsug ste /
T02D2302:240b-36: ri khrod ma yi sa der gnas bcas la //
T02D2302:240b-37: zhes pa ni ri khrod ma de lta bu'i bdag nyid grub pa'i chos kyi yi ge //
T02D2302:240b-38: bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gnas byas pa de de ni gnas byas pa'o //
T02D2302:240b-39: khyad par ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D2302:240b-40: seng ge yis kyang mchong bar mi nus na //
T02D2302:240b-42: mchong mi nus pa ni gzhom par mi nus pa'o //
T02D2302:240b-44: seng ge ni gdong pa lnga pa ste /
T02D2302:240b-45: de nyid dkyil 'khor lnga'i bdag nyid kyi srog gi rlung seng ges gnon par mi nus te /
T02D2302:241a-0: drug pa ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir @241a * //
T02D2302:241a-2: / glang po che yis smos ci dgos //
T02D2302:241a-4: glang po che ni phyugs te /
T02D2302:241a-5: nyi ma dang zla ba ste /
T02D2302:241a-6: de dag gis thag ring por 'gom pa dang gsal bar ga la nus zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2302:241a-7: de ltar zla ba nyi ma phyugs chen po //
T02D2302:241a-9: 'dir dgos pa ni zla ba dang nyi ma'i dkyil
T02D2302:241a-10: 'khor du rgyu ba'i rlung la zhon pa'i rnam par
T02D2302:241a-11: shes pa'i khams nyid kyis thams cad las thams cad
T02D2302:241a-12: du thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa
T02D2302:241a-13: dang bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po rdo rje
T02D2302:241a-15: de ltar yang lus skyes pa'i lus la nges par gang du gnas she na /
T02D2302:241a-16: 'di yi rigs mchog dag tu 'di yis bon bstan //
T02D2302:241a-17: zhes bya ba la sogs pa tshigs bcad phyed dang
T02D2302:241a-18: gnyis ni rtogs par byas bas 'dir ma smos so
T02D2302:241a-19: // gong du ji skad bstan pa'i las kyi phyag
T02D2302:241a-20: rgya gang du mthong ba'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya
T02D2302:241a-21: mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba chen po rdzogs pas /
T02D2302:241a-23: sngags dang rgyud ni gcig kyang mi bya ste //
T02D2302:241a-25: gcig kyang bya mi bya ste /
T02D2302:241a-27: sngags kyi bzlas pa ni gsang sngags kyi bzlas pa'o //
T02D2302:241a-29: ci'i phyir de ltar yin zhe na /
T02D2302:241a-30: rang khyim bdag mo zhes gsungs te /
T02D2302:241a-31: rang khyim bdag mo ni lhan cig rang snang ba'i ye shes kyang phyag rgya ste /
T02D2302:241a-32: bzung ba ni bla ma dam pa'i gdams ngag gis so //
T02D2302:241a-33: grol 'gyur ni yid dang rjes su mthun pa'i phyag
T02D2302:241a-34: rgya dang lhan cig skyes pa rnams kyis byed do
T02D2302:241a-35: zhes bya ba'o // de ltar yang dpal dus kyi 'khor lo las /
T02D2302:241a-36: sems kyi snang ba tsam du yid las skyes pa'i me long gzugs brnyan lta bu ste //
T02D2302:241a-37: rnal 'byor dbang phyug bsten bya ma lus sangs rgyas
T02D2302:241a-38: lnga dang sras bcas rnams kyis sten de'i ye shes
T02D2302:241a-39: 'od zer bskyed // rang gi lus dang bcas pa'i
T02D2302:241a-40: bdud rnams sgrib pa ma lus bsreg /'dod chags la
T02D2302:241a-41: sogs bsreg cing lo gcig sbyor bas lus la ro
T02D2302:241a-44: bcom ldan 'das med nyid la mngon du zhen pa'i rnal 'byor pa des /
T02D2302:241a-45: sngags dang rgyud la 'dzin cing zhen par mi bya'o //
T02D2302:241a-46: 'di'i don ni 'di yin te de nyid gang ste /
T02D2302:241a-47: byang chub kyi sems kyi yid yin par bsngags so //
T02D2302:241b-0: de nyid du 'tshogs @241b pa'i rgyu yin pas na
T02D2302:241b-1: skad kyi dbyings kyi rgyal po nye bar 'khor 'dzin
T02D2302:241b-3: de la mngon par dga' bas thams cad byas pa yin no zhes pa'o //
T02D2302:241b-4: de ltar yang dgyes pa'i rdo rje las /
T02D2302:241b-5: sngags bzlas dka' thub med cing dkyil 'khor sbyin sreg med //
T02D2302:241b-6: de nyid sngags bzlas dka' thub sbyin sreg de nyid yin //
T02D2302:241b-7: de nyid dkyil 'khor ba dang dkyil 'khor nyid //
T02D2302:241b-9: de nyid kyi don gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2302:241b-10: de srid khyim bdag mo ni rang khyim gnas ma 'gyur //
T02D2302:241b-12: rang gi khyim ni thams cad stong pa nyid /
T02D2302:241b-13: sdig spangs kyi gnas ni rang gi khyim mo //
T02D2302:241b-14: phyag rgya chen po ni khyim bdag mo ste //
T02D2302:241b-15: ji srid du gnas par ma gyur pa ni thim par ma gyur pa'o //
T02D2302:241b-17: re zhig mngon par byang chub pa lngas sems can mang pos bsam pa'i bye brag gis zhal dang //
T02D2302:241b-18: phyag rgya dang kha dog dbyibs la sogs pa sna
T02D2302:241b-19: tshogs kyis de ltar ji ltar gnas te mi gnas
T02D2302:241b-20: so zhes bya'o // de yang dpal dang po'i sangs rgyas kyi rgyud las /
T02D2302:241b-21: las kyi phyag rgya mnyam sbyor zhing //
T02D2302:241b-22: ye shes phyag rgya sogs dmigs nas //
T02D2302:241b-23: phyag rgya chen po gcig sbyor bas //
T02D2302:241b-25: kun du zhal dang phyag la sogs //
T02D2302:241b-26: kun du dbu dang spyan dang gdong //
T02D2302:241b-27: kun du 'jig rten thos par ldan //
T02D2302:241b-28: thams cad khyab nas gnas pa'o //
T02D2302:241b-30: de nyid lha rdzas kyi phyag rgya de nyid kyi
T02D2302:241b-31: 'bras bu'i phyag rgya chen po bsgrub pa'i gdams ngag
T02D2302:241b-32: nges par bstan cing yang de nyid bstan pa ni
T02D2302:241b-33: / bzlas dang sbyin sreg dkyil 'khor las 'di yin//
T02D2302:241b-35: phyi rol du gyur pa'i bzlas pa dang /
T02D2302:241b-36: dkyil 'khor dang sbyin sreg gi las 'dis ni nyi
T02D2302:241b-37: ma re re zhing ci'i phyir gnas zhes bya ba
T02D2302:241b-38: ste / steng du kha bltas shing ci'i phyir ku
T02D2302:241b-39: re'i ngo bo nyid 'bras bu med ces bya ba'i
T02D2302:241b-40: ste / don to // 'di rnams ci'i phyir don med pa yin zhe na /
T02D2302:241b-41: de lta bu'i gzhon nu ma dang rtag tu ma mjal na zhes gsungs te /
T02D2302:241b-42: de nyid rtag tu gzhon nu ma la 'dod chags kyi rang bzhin yin pas /
T02D2302:241b-43: de nyid lha rdzas kyi phyag rgya ste /
T02D2302:241b-44: de la dba' rlabs med pa'i rtag tu dga' ba
T02D2302:241b-45: la sogs pa'i rim pa gang gis rjes su chags
T02D2302:241b-46: pa skye ba de dba' rlabs med pa'i mdza' bas
T02D2302:242a-1: lus 'di yin te byang chub ji ltar 'grub //
T02D2302:242a-3: byang chub kyi phyag rgya chen po ste /
T02D2302:242a-5: sngon du bstan pa'i ae wam gyi yi ge'i lus med na mi 'grub ces pa'i don to //
T02D2302:242a-6: gang gis rtag tu lhan skyes bde rtogs na //
T02D2302:242a-7: zhes gsungs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D2302:242a-8: gang gis rin chen sems ni brtan byas pa //
T02D2302:242a-10: rab tu gtum pa'i gtum mo mes zhu bar byas nas /
T02D2302:242a-11: bskyod par mi nus pa'i phyir gang gis brtan par
T02D2302:242a-12: byas pa'i sems rin po che byang chub kyi sems
T02D2302:242a-13: so // ci byas nas zhes pa la /
T02D2302:242a-14: rang gi khyim bdag mo blangs nas 'di zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2302:242a-15: rang gi khyim bdag mo ni lha rdzas kyi phyag rgya de nyid de /
T02D2302:242a-16: de la ae wam gyi yi ge de la bde
T02D2302:242a-17: ba chen po'i gzugs bzung nas de nyid rdo rje
T02D2302:242a-19: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gtso bo ste /
T02D2302:242a-20: de nyid bod pa'i tshig go //
T02D2302:242a-21: mchog gi don ni bdag gis rab brjod na //
T02D2302:242a-22: bdag nag po rdo rjes mchog gi don ma bcos pa 'di brjod do zhes pa ste /
T02D2302:242a-23: don 'di las gzhan med do zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2302:242a-24: de nyid dpes bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2302:242a-25: tshva ni chu la zhugs pa bzhin du ni //
T02D2302:242a-27: tshva chu la zhugs pa de bzhin du khyim gyi
T02D2302:242a-28: bdag mo ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i rang bzhin blangs
T02D2302:242a-29: pa'o // sems ni byang chub kyi sems te ro gcig bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2302:242a-30: de ltar dpal dgyes pa'i rdo rje las /
T02D2302:242a-31: khu ba'i rnam pa bcom ldan 'das //
T02D2302:242a-32: de yis bde ba 'dod mar brjod //
T02D2302:242a-34: khu ba dang bde ba de nyid kyang rten dang
T02D2302:242a-35: brten pa ngo bo nyid de dag thams cad stong
T02D2302:242a-36: pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du brjod pa bde ba
T02D2302:242a-37: mnyam zhing ro gcig pa de'i skad cig las 'gyur
T02D2302:242a-38: ro // de ltar yang dpal dang po'i sangs rgyas las /
T02D2302:242a-39: ji srid rten dang brten pa'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D2302:242a-41: sems ni 'gog pa nyid gyur nas //
T02D2302:242a-42: rten dang brten pa'i mtshan nyid med //
T02D2302:242a-44: de ltar yang kha sbyor thig le las /
T02D2302:242a-45: sna yi bu ga gnyis nas ni //
T02D2302:242a-46: 'jug pa bde ba dus zhes brjod //
T02D2302:242a-47: 'byung ba bde ba dus yin te //
T02D2302:242a-48: de gnyis nyid ni gcig par grags //
T02D2302:242a-49: grogs med dag ni gcig pu ni //
T02D2302:242a-50: bsam gyis mi khyab dus nyid 'gro //
T02D2302:242a-51: srog dang thur sel mnyam gnas dang //
T02D2302:242b-2: dus gcig tu ni de brjod do //
T02D2302:242b-3: 'dod chags ma yin chags bral min //
T02D2302:242b-4: dbu mar dmigs par mi 'gyur ro //
T02D2302:242b-5: 'dod chags ma yin chags bral lam //
T02D2302:242b-6: gnyis po 'dres pa gzhom du med //
T02D2302:242b-7: mar ni mar du zhu gyur pa //
T02D2302:242b-8: 'dres par gyur pa rnyog med ltar //
T02D2302:242b-9: de bzhin 'dod chags bral ba ltar //
T02D2302:242b-10: skad cig la ni ro gcig 'gyur //
T02D2302:242b-12: gang gi de dang rtag tu gnas na ni //
T02D2302:242b-14: gal te de gnyis phan tshun du'o //
T02D2302:242b-15: rtag tu gnas pa ni rgyun mi 'chad par de'i tshe yang 'di ltar 'gyur zhes pa'o //
T02D2302:242b-16: 'di'i don ni de ltar bstan pa'i khams kyi khu
T02D2302:242b-17: ba dang ngo bo dag phan tshun rgyun mi 'chad
T02D2302:242b-18: par bya'o // gal te gzhan du 'gyur na /
T02D2302:242b-19: khu ba'i ngo bo nyid zla ba'i rang bzhin no //
T02D2302:242b-21: khrag gi rang bzhin nyi mar snang bas sbrul ba'i sku nus par gnas pa'o //
T02D2302:242b-22: bde ba'i ngo bo nyid du gnas pa'i khyim bdag
T02D2302:242b-23: mo dang lhan cig tu byang chub kyi sems 'di
T02D2302:242b-24: gnyis ka'i sbyor bas gong bur gyur nas skye ba
T02D2302:242b-25: dang 'jig pa'i 'khor ba'i lam nas 'das nas /
T02D2302:242b-26: ro gcig pa rgyun 'byung ba'i dpal he ru kar 'gyur ro //
T02D2302:242b-27: de ltar yang dpal kha sbyor thig le las /
T02D2302:242b-28: gang tshe mgron gnas chags chen po //
T02D2302:242b-29: zla ba'i gzugs kyis gnas gyur pas //
T02D2302:242b-30: sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku mchog yin //
T02D2302:242b-31: gang tshe rdo rje rtse gnas pa'i //
T02D2302:242b-32: de tshe longs spyod rdzogs pa yi //
T02D2302:242b-33: sku yang nus par 'gyur ba yin //
T02D2302:242b-35: nyungs kar du ni rnam par grags //
T02D2302:242b-36: nyi ma'i gzugs su yang dag grags //
T02D2302:242b-37: sprul pa'i sku ru brjod par bya //
T02D2302:242b-38: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams //
T02D2302:242b-39: de la spro zhing skye ba yi //
T02D2302:242b-40: padma gar dbang rgyal po ni //
T02D2302:242b-43: dpal nag po rdo rje'i do ha mdzod kyi 'grel
